The only safe way to modify a collection while iteration in progress is through the collection iterator, either iterator or ListIterator.
Using the set, add, remove function



    public static void main(String[] args) {
        // TODO Auto-generated method stub
        List<Integer> list = new ArrayList<>(Arrays.asList(1, 2, 3, 4, 5));
        for (ListIterator<Integer> li = list.listIterator(); li.hasNext();) {
            Integer value = li.next();
            if (value == 3) {
                li.add(10);
                System.out.println(li.previousIndex()); -> 2
            }
        }

        list.forEach(System.out::println);
    }
